author: PixelTracksAlpaka
body:
#### PR description:

This PR stems from #41117 and it's the 6th of a series of smaller PRs:

- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41282
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41284
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41285
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41286
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41287
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41288

It adds the needed DQM modules under `DQM/SiPixelHeterogeneous/`.
 
This PR requires  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41282, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41284, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41285, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41286 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41287 to be properly merged.

#### PR validation:

It compiles. Running base tests. No regression expected.
title: Pixel Alpaka Migration: DQM [VI]
